name: Dragon Rush (T3_t, Stardrop Dev, Famalda)
description:
Game Submission for the 1st Tua Game Jam in Instituto Politécnico de Bragança

Run from the dragon for as long as you can! - Endless Runner

A game by:

  • Rafael Silva (3D Art & Animation)
  • Mafalda Veiga (3D Environment Art & Icons)
  • Tiago Barracha (Code)
